entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
